about_the_game:
Dive back into the thrilling adventures of Slugterra with Slugterra All-Stars!

This action-packed compilation brings together four fan-favorite games: Battle for Slugterra, Secret of the Shadow Mines, Slug Run, and Slug Wars!

Experience the excitement all over again, now fully optimized for your PC.

Get ready to master your slugs, take on epic challenges, and become the ultimate Slugslinger in this must-have collection for any Slugterra fan!

Battle for Slugterra

Young slugslinger Eli Shane must traverse the caverns of Slugterra collecting powerful slugs, solving puzzles and battling a horde of nefarious enemies along the way - including the evil Dr. Blakk!

Secret of the Shadow Mines

Eli Shane must delve into the depths of the Shadow Mines in search of powerful slugs and ancient artifacts, but these winding caverns are crawling with enemies and the walls move with a dark purpose!

Slug Run

Eli Shane must jump, dive and boost his way to victory in Slug Run in this fast paced endless runner. Just watch out for hot air balloons, cactuses and gaping chasms.

Slug Wars

The Slug Wars have begun! Take on the role of a general and command your army of slugs in this turn-based strategy game. Go head-to-head with enemy slugs to reclaim territory, earn bonuses, and charge up unique slug powers to use on the field of battle!

name: Slugterra All-Stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SSE2 instruction set support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive back into the thrilling adventures of Slugterra with Slugterra All-Stars! This action-packed compilation brings together four fan-favorite games: Battle for Slugterra, Secret of the Shadow Mines, Slug Run, and Slug Wars! Experience the excitement all over again!
